Key Match Events: KL Rahul departed for 9 from 14 deliveries in Perth vs South Africa
Lungi Ngidi got the big wickets of India's captain Rohit Sharma and vice-captain KL Rahul
Pre-Game Insights: The India team management was asked on the eve of the match against South Africa in Perth whether they were thinking of replacing KL Rahul with Rishabh Pant
Batting coach Vikram Rathour backed the out-of-form vice-captain KL Rahul
Post-Match Reflections: KL Rahul looked dejected as he was unable to control the bounce
The pressure is now growing on the vice-captain who has looked completely out of rhythm in the World Cup campaign in Australia
Miscellaneous Highlights: KL Rahul's place in the T20I side has been questioned
Rahul has played 27 innings in the powerplay in the last 2 years and averages less than 30 and has a strike rate of less than 120
